body:
Instead of adding the comments, might make more sense to define the codes somewhere:
```
(def enter-keycode 13)
(def esc-keycode 27)
```
 This can be reused by other parts of code and is more robust than the comment (imagine appending a 1 to the 13 in a big pull request and this is missed by the reviewers)
